name: XRInputSourcesChangeEvent.added
description: The read-only XRInputSourcesChangeEvent property added is a list of zero or more input sources, each identified using an XRInputSource object, which have been newly made available for use.

refs.name: WebXR Device API
refs.description: The definition of 'XRInputSourcesChangeEvent.added' in the 'WebXR Device API' specification.
